name: Ajax plugin for Smarty template engine
short_description:
Smarty is PHP based template engine (http://smarty.php.net). Many open source projects are providing Javascript and PHP library to serve this purpose.  Smarty provides strong plug-in arch.
This project is intended to develop Smarty based Ajax plug-in
